content: Two-factor authentication is a more secure way for the users to enter the portal. After the credentials are entered, the user will have to enter the code from the SMS received to the mobile phone with the number which was specified at the first portal login or the code from an authentication application.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the mobile verification process for two-factor authentication. The description will appear in a category title on a mobile view of access portal settings and explains how users receive a code via SMS or an authentication app to complete the login process.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "الرموز السرية" (al-rumooz al-sirriyyah) translates to 'secret codes' which is not the most accurate representation of 'credentials' in this context.  'بيانات الاعتماد' (bayanat al-i'timad) would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'الرموز السرية' with 'بيانات الاعتماد'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "البوابة الأولى لتسجيل الدخول" (al-bawwabah al-oola li tasjeel ad-dukhool) translates literally to 'the first portal for login.'  A more natural and understandable phrasing would be something along the lines of 'تسجيل الدخول الأول' (tasjeel ad-dukhool al-awwal) meaning 'first login' or 'initial login'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'البوابة الأولى لتسجيل الدخول' with 'تسجيل الدخول الأول'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The text flow might be slightly improved by rephrasing to avoid a series of short clauses.  While grammatically correct, it reads a bit choppy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider combining sentences for better flow. For example, 'سيطلب من المستخدم بعد إدخال بيانات الاعتماد أن يدخل رمز من الرسائل القصيرة المستلمة على الهاتف المسجل في البوابة أو الرمز الموجود في تطبيق المصادقة.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "daha təhlükəsiz üsuldur" translates to "a more dangerous method" instead of "a more secure method." It should convey the positive aspect of security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: daha təhlükəli deyil, daha təhlükəli olmayan üsuldur

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "nömrənin aldığı kodu" is awkward. It literally means 'the code received by the number'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: göstərilən mobil nömrəyə göndərilən SMS-dən alınan kodu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and could be split for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İki mərhələli təsdiqləmə istifadəçilərin portala daxil olması üçün daha təhlükəli olmayan üsuldur. İstifadəçi məlumatlarını daxil etdikdən sonra, göstərilən mobil nömrəyə göndərilən SMS-dən alınan kodu və ya təsdiqləmə proqramından alınan kodu daxil etməlidir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "идентификационните данни" (identification data) is a bit formal and doesn't perfectly align with "credentials" in the English. A more natural translation would be something like "потребителско име и парола" (username and password) or simply "данните за вход" (login details).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Двуфакторното удостоверяване е по-сигурен начин за влизане на потребителите в портала. След като потребителското име и паролата се въведат, потребителят ще трябва да въведе кода от SMS, получен на номера, който е бил посочен при първото влизане в портала, или кода от приложението за удостоверяване.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the portal' is translated as 'vstupu uživatelů do portálu'. While grammatically correct, it's slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'přístupu do portálu' or 'přihlášení do portálu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dvoufázové ověřování představuje bezpečnější způsob přístupu do portálu / přihlášení do portálu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authentication application' is translated literally as 'autentizační aplikace'. While understandable, a more common and slightly more user-friendly term in Czech would be 'ověřovací aplikace'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dvoufázové ověřování představuje bezpečnější způsob vstupu uživatelů do portálu. Po zadání přihlašovacích údajů bude muset uživatel zadat kód z SMS zprávy přijaté na mobilní telefon s číslem, které bylo zadáno při prvním přihlášení do portálu, nebo kód z ověřovací aplikace.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'After the credentials are entered' is translated as 'Nach der Eingabe der Anmeldedaten'. While technically correct, 'Nach der Authentifizierung' or 'Nach der Eingabe von Benutzername und Passwort' would be more natural and clearer in German.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nach der Authentifizierung

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'the code from an authentication application' is translated as 'den Code aus einer Authentifizierungs-App'. While understandable, it's slightly less formal. A better translation would be 'den Code aus einer Authenticator-App'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: den Code aus einer Authenticator-App

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "the portal" is translated as "την πύλη" which while technically correct, sounds a bit formal and unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like "στην πλατφόρμα" or "στον ιστότοπο".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "στην πύλη" with "στην πλατφόρμα" or "στον ιστότοπο".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "authentication application" is translated as "εφαρμογή ταυτοποίησης." While technically accurate, it's a bit clunky. "Εφαρμογή ελέγχου ταυτότητας" would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "εφαρμογή ταυτοποίησης" with "εφαρμογή ελέγχου ταυτότητας".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de que los usuarios accedan al portal" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "para que los usuarios accedan al portal" or "para que los usuarios puedan acceder al portal".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: para que los usuarios accedan al portal

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "el código del SMS" is a literal translation.  While understandable, a more common expression in Spanish might be "el código SMS".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: el código SMS

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'the code from the SMS received to the mobile phone' is awkward in Finnish. It's better to describe it as 'the code received via SMS'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaksivaiheinen varmentaminen on käyttäjille turvallisempi tapa kirjautua portaaliin. Kun kirjautumistiedot on syötetty, käyttäjän tulee syöttää tekstiviestillä vastaanotettu koodi ja numero, joka määritettiin ensimmäisen kirjautumisen yhteydessä tai koodi todennussovelluksesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'the number which was specified at the first portal login' is not the most natural way to express this in Finnish. It's better to say 'the number registered during the first login'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaksivaiheinen varmentaminen on käyttäjille turvallisempi tapa kirjautua portaaliin. Kun kirjautumistiedot on syötetty, käyttäjän tulee syöttää tekstiviestillä vastaanotettu koodi ja numero, joka on rekisteröity ensimmäisen kirjautumisen yhteydessä tai koodi todennussovelluksesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to enter the portal' is translated as 'd'accéder au portail.' While technically correct, 'pour se connecter au portail' would be more natural and common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pour se connecter au portail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Two-factor authentication' is translated as 'Երկգործոն նույնականացումը'. While technically correct, a more common and natural translation would be 'քսանգործոնե վկայեցում' (ksangordone vkayecum).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Երկգործոն նույնականացումը' with 'քսանգործոնե վկայեցում' (ksangordone vkayecum).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authentication application' is translated as 'նույնականացման հավելված'. It would be more accurate to use 'չարաշահման դիմացության հավելված' (charashahman dimacyutyun havvelvad), reflecting the purpose of such apps.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'նույնականացման հավելված' with 'չարաշահման դիմացության հավելված' (charashahman dimacyutyun havvelvad).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly awkward: 'Հավատարմագրերը մուտքագրելուց հետո օգտատերը պետք է մուտքագրի...'  A more natural flow would be something like 'Հավատարմագրերը մուտքագրելուց հետո օգտատերը պարտադրված է մուտքագրել...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase 'Հավատարմագրերը մուտքագրելուց հետո օգտատերը պետք է մուտքագրի' to 'Հավատարմագրերը մուտքագրելուց հետո օգտատերը պարտադրված է մուտքագրել'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "consentire agli utenti di accedere al portale" (allow users to access the portal) doesn't accurately reflect the English "for the users to enter the portal". A more accurate translation would be something like "per gli utenti di accedere al portale" (for users to access the portal) or "per gli utenti di entrare nel portale" (for users to enter the portal).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: per gli utenti di accedere al portale

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "codice proveniente dall'SMS" is a bit awkward. A more natural way to express 'code from the SMS' in Italian is 'codice ricevuto via SMS'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: codice ricevuto via SMS

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Similarly, the phrasing "codice proveniente da un'applicazione di autenticazione" is a bit stiff.  "codice da un'applicazione di autenticazione" would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: codice da un'applicazione di autenticazione

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "最初のポータルログインで指定された番号の携帯電話" is a bit awkward. It literally translates to 'mobile phone with the number specified at the first portal login'. A more natural phrasing would be something like '最初に登録した携帯電話' (saikin ni touroku shita keitaiden) or '登録時に指定した携帯電話' (touroku jikan ni shiteki shita keitaiden).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 二要素認証は、ユーザーがポータルに入るための、より安全な方法です。認証情報が入力された後、ユーザーは最初に登録した携帯電話に受信したSMSからコードを入力するか、認証アプリケーションからコードを入力する必要があります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. Combining the two conditions for code entry (SMS or authentication app) into one sentence would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 二要素認証は、ユーザーがポータルに入るための、より安全な方法です。認証情報が入力された後、ユーザーは最初に登録した携帯電話に受信したSMSまたは認証アプリケーションからコードを入力する必要があります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a somewhat formal tone, which might be slightly stiff for a user-facing description. Consider a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이중 인증은 사용자가 포털에 접속할 때 더욱 안전하게 보호받을 수 있는 방법입니다. 아이디와 비밀번호를 입력한 후, 처음 포털에 로그인할 때 등록한 휴대폰으로 받은 인증번호 또는 인증 앱의 코드를 입력해야 합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “enter the portal” is translated as “접속할 때”. While not technically wrong, a more natural phrasing would be to say “로그인할 때”.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이중 인증은 사용자가 포털에 로그인할 때 보다 안전하게 보호받을 수 있는 방법입니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “authentication application” could be translated more simply as “인증 앱” for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 최초 포털 로그인 시 지정한 휴대폰 번호로 수신한 SMS의 코드 또는 인증 앱의 코드를 입력해야 합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the portal' is translated as 'ເຂົ້າໃນປະຕູ'. While technically correct, a more natural and commonly used phrasing in Lao would be 'ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ' (khao su lap-ob) meaning 'log in'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authentication application' is translated as 'ຄໍາຮ້ອງສະຫມັກການກວດສອບຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງ'. A more common and simpler translation would be 'ແອັບຯຮັບເອກສູດ' or 'ແອັບຯຢັ້ງຢືນຕົວຕົນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແອັບຯຮັບເອກສູດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ຫຼັງຈາກການປ້ອນຂໍ້ມູນປະຈໍາຕົວ, ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຈະຕ້ອງໃສ່ລະຫັດ...' could be slightly improved for flow. It is a little wordy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫຼັງຈາກປ້ອນຂໍ້ມູນປະຈໍາຕົວແລ້ວ, ຜູ້ໃຊ້ຈະຕ້ອງໃສ່ລະຫັດ...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'akreditācijas' is not the correct translation for 'credentials' in this context. 'Akreditācijas' typically refers to certification or accreditation. A more suitable term would be 'autorizācijas dati' (authorization data) or 'lietošanas dati' (login data).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'akreditācijas datu' with 'autorizācijas datu' or 'lietošanas datu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'pirmajā portāla pieteikšanās reizē' is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'pirmajā reizē, kad lietotājs ievadīja datus portālā' or 'pirmajā reizē, kad lietotājs pieteicās portālā'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels somewhat long and complex. Consider breaking it into two shorter sentences for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Split the sentence: 'Pēc akreditācijas datu ievadīšanas lietotājam mobilajā tālrunī būs jāievada kods no saņemtās SMS ar numuru, kas tika norādīts pirmajā portāla pieteikšanās reizē, vai kods no autentifikācijas lietojumprogrammas.' into 'Pēc autorizācijas datu ievadīšanas lietotājam būs jāievada kods. Kods var būt saņemts SMS vai autentifikācijas lietojumprogrammā.' (or similar)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'de het portaal te gebruiken' is grammatically incorrect. 'de' and 'het' are both definite articles, and the correct article should be determined by the gender of 'portaal'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: het portaal te gebruiken

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'moet de gebruiker de code invoeren' is slightly awkward. It can be improved for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: moet de gebruiker een code invoeren

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'After the credentials are entered' is translated as 'Nadaten de inloggegevens zijn ingevoerd'. While technically correct, a more natural translation might be 'Na het invoeren van de inloggegevens'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Na het invoeren van de inloggegevens

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "os usuários entrarem no portal" is slightly awkward. A more natural Portuguese phrasing would be "acessarem o portal" or "acenderem ao portal".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A autenticação de dois fatores é uma forma mais segura de os usuários acessarem o portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "telemóvel com o número que foi especificado no primeiro login no portal" is quite long and a bit convoluted. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: telemóvel associado à conta ao iniciar sessão no portal

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'utilizador' is perfectly acceptable, but 'usuário' is more common in Brazil, which might be relevant depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A autenticação de dois fatores é uma forma mais segura de os usuários acessarem o portal. Depois de introduzidas as credenciais, o usuário terá que inserir o código do SMS recebido no telemóvel associado à conta ao iniciar sessão no portal ou o código de uma aplicação de autenticação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation uses "os usuários" which is grammatically correct, but less common and slightly more formal than "os usuários". A more natural phrasing would be "os usuários podem acessar o portal".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os usuários podem acessar o portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Depois de introduzidas as credenciais" is a bit stiff and formal.  A more natural phrasing would be "Após inserir as credenciais" or simply "Depois que inserir as credenciais".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Depois que inserir as credenciais.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'no telemóvel' is less commonly used than 'no celular'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: no celular

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'aplicação de autenticação' is somewhat formal.  A more common and readily understood term would be 'aplicativo autenticador'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: aplicativo autenticador

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'the code from an authentication application' is not directly equivalent to the English 'code from an authentication application'. It's more accurate to say 'код из приложения аутентификации' rather than 'код из приложения для аутентификации'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: код из приложения аутентификации

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Номер телефона указывается при первом входе с помощью двухфакторной аутентификации' implies that the phone number is entered during the initial two-factor authentication setup, which is not the original message meaning. The original says the phone number was specified at the *first portal login*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Номер телефона был указан при первой авторизации в портале.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'credentials are entered' is translated as 'අක්තපත්‍ර ඇතුල් කිරීමෙන් පසු' which literally means 'after document entry'. While understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala. A more accurate translation would be something like 'මු credence න් පසු' or 'ලොග් කිරීමෙන් පසු'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මු credence න් පසු

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'authentication application' is translated as 'සත්‍යාපන යෙදුම'. While technically correct, a more commonly used and easily understood term would be 'authentication app' or a descriptive phrase related to 'authentication apps'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: authentication app

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a mix of Sinhala script and transliteration for some words. While transliteration can be helpful, maintaining consistency in the script would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use full Sinhala script throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "enter the portal" is translated as "vstupu používateľov do portálu". While technically correct, a more natural translation would be "prihlásiť sa do portálu" or "získať prístup do portálu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: prihlásiť sa do portálu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "authentication application" is translated as "autentifikačnej aplikácie". A more common and understood translation would be "overovacia aplikácia".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: overovacia aplikácia

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'poverilnic' is a less common and potentially awkward phrasing. While technically correct, 'prijava' or 'uporabniško ime in geslo' might be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po vnosu uporabniškega imena in gesla bo moral uporabnik...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'na mobilni telefon s številko, ki je bila podana' is a bit convoluted. It could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: na mobilni telefon s številko, ki jo je uporabnik navedel...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "на мобилни телефон са бројем који је био наведен" is a bit clunky. It can be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: на мобилни телефон са бројем који је наведен

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'enter the portal' is translated as 'приступе порталу'. While technically correct, 'уђу на портал' or 'пријаве се на портал' would be more natural in Serbian in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: уђу на портал

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a hyphenated word 'Dvofaktorska'. While technically correct, it's less common and could be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dvofaktorska autentifikacija -> Dva faktora autentifikacija

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically acceptable, 'prijavljivanja' can be slightly more formal than necessary.  A less formal alternative is preferable depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: prijavljivanja -> ulaska

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation contains a slightly repetitive phrasing: 'portala girmesinin daha güvenli bir yoludur' followed by 'portala girmesi gerekecektir'. While technically correct, it could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İki faktörlü kimlik doğrulama, kullanıcıların portala güvenli bir şekilde giriş yapmasını sağlar. Kimlik bilgileri girildikten sonra, kullanıcının cep telefonuna gelen SMS'deki kodu veya bir kimlik doğrulama uygulamasından gelen kodu girmesi gerekecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'authentication application' is literally translated as 'kimlik doğrulama uygulaması'. While accurate, a more natural Turkish phrasing might be preferred depending on the application's branding or common usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more colloquial or brand-specific term for 'authentication application', e.g., 'doğrulama uygulaması' or a specific app name if applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "простору" in "який було вказано під час першого входу до простору" is not the best translation for 'portal'. 'Портал' should be consistently used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: який було вказано під час першого входу до порталу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. It's a bit long and complex.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Двофакторна аутентифікація - це більш надійний спосіб доступу користувачів до порталу. Після введення облікових даних користувачу необхідно ввести код з SMS-повідомлення, отриманого на номер мобільного телефону, вказаний під час першого входу до порталу, або код із застосунку для аутентифікації.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enter the portal' is translated as 'truy cập cổng thông tin', which is accurate but could be more natural. A better phrasing might be 'đăng nhập vào cổng thông tin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: đăng nhập vào cổng thông tin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'authentication application' is literally translated. 'Ứng dụng xác thực' is technically correct, but 'ứng dụng xác thực hai yếu tố' would be more specific and clearer for users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ứng dụng xác thực hai yếu tố

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Two-factor authentication is a more secure way for the users to enter the portal" is awkward. The repeated 'user' makes it ungrammatical and unclear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 双因素身份验证是用户访问门户网站的一种更安全的方式。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '用户用户' is a repetition and grammatically incorrect. It should be just '用户'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用户

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '首次登录门户时指定的号码' is somewhat ambiguous. It would be clearer to say when and where the number was specified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 首次登录门户网站时所填写的手机号码

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '身份验证应用中的代码' is okay, but could be slightly improved for natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 身份验证应用的代码
